member.name: DWRITE_TYPOGRAPHIC_FEATURES
member.summary: Contains a set of typographic features to be applied during text shaping.

member.name: DWRITE_TYPOGRAPHIC_FEATURES.features
member.summary: A pointer to a structure that specifies properties used to identify and execute typographic features in the font.

member.name: DWRITE_TYPOGRAPHIC_FEATURES.featureCount
member.summary: A value that indicates the number of features being applied to a font face.
